name: Yoga: Slow Flow
description: This is a yoga class that moves slowly and holds poses for longer than other yoga classes. It's a gentle practice that's good for beginners and those who want to de-stress.

name: Yoga: Vinyasa Flow
description: This yoga practice is active and fast-paced, and sequences often include balancing and backbending postures. The term vinyasa refers to the alignment of movement with the breath, so although you may also hold poses for a few breaths, you'll move from one pose to the next using the inhalation and exhalation.

name: Metabolic Conditioning
description: A class that combines strength and cardio conditioning into a circuit of moderate and high intensity exercises.

name: Trampoline Fitness
description: A class that combines strength and cardio conditioning into a circuit of moderate and high intensity exercises.
